attributes.action: Allow students to give teachers the grade they believe they deserve
attributes.background: Allow alevel students to tell teachers what grades they believe they deserve backed up by evidence. As well as removing the ranking system a C is a C students shouldn’t be moved down. Teachers should just be able to take this into account as it’s our lives it’s effecting teachers have jobs already

rejection.details: You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773.
